author: dkhaywood
msg: If type is annotated as @Immutable, then now automatically installs a DisabledFacet on each of its properties.... fix to test.

author: dkhaywood
msg: If type is annotated as @Immutable, then now automatically installs a DisabledFacet on each of its properties.

author: dkhaywood
msg: DescribedAsFacet will now be added to a property or a parameter if there is none on the property/parameter but there is one on the underlying type.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Added adapter decorator classes to make it easy to write decorators for NakedObjectReflector and NakedObjectPersistor.
